actions.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition

official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to modify the numerical limitation applicable to group-living arrangements, for determining the eligibility of certain recipients of social security benefits who reside in such arrangements to receive allotments.

summary.text: Revises the definition of "food" under the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to increase from 16 to 25 the number of blind and disabled persons receiving social security benefits who may reside in a group-living arrangement for purposes of food stamp eligibility.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to modify the numerical limitation applicable to group-living arrangements, for determining the eligibility of certain recipients of social security benefits who reside in such arrangements to receive allotments.
